episodes.title: Credits: Disciples - The Cult of TB Joshua
episodes.description: This week we cover the the BBC Africa documentary about 'Pastor' TB Joshua. We discuss religion, cults and how such monstrosities were able to be carried out for so long. On a lighter note, we also discuss the new Mean Girls movie, Willy Wonka and the movie releases we’re looking forward to. As always, we mention the documentary we're covering next week at the end!  Link to the documentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UZZVQxjXWCg&list=PLajyiGz4JeyNQnWs8QEe-flPqe2xqrQAp&pp=iAQB  Episodes mentioned this week:  08. Sex for Grades https://open.spotify.com/episode/0Ce551qp9c9WoMyKERmZiO?si=nKIGE3_kS9W2v1rGW8YZmQ  https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000470614458  116. A Very British Cult https://open.spotify.com/episode/3VEXuJE1qNHh00YM2naRlK?si=eqaVkB_tTYiMY2iu9u9LUw  https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000613847491  Social media:  tiktok.com/2girls1docpodcast instagram.com/2girls1doc twitter.com/2girls1doc youtube.com/2girls1doc facebook.com/2girls1doc 2girls1doc@gmail.com
